answers.answer: Compression socks will help the swelling in your feet, you can get them at any pharmacy.
It's totally normal, but it can also be a sign of preeclampsia, so ask your Dr.
Face isnt normal id call your dr tom to let them know

question: Well I am 27 weeks and its the first time I've swelled up on my feet. And not only that my face feels a tingly should I be worried?? I'm a first time mom and I dont know if its normal.
title: worried
